member.name: M:StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Generate Md5 Hash form given string
member.param: String that will be computed to hash.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Converts first latter of string to Uppercase
member.returns: Input string with first latter converted to uppercase.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Convert Cyrillic to Latin Letters using Phonetic Traditional standart

member.name: M:StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Convert Latin to Cyrillic Letters using Phonetic Traditional standart

member.name: M:StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Convert the Cyrillic letters to Latin using Traditional Phonetic and remove all non-alphanumeric characters exept numbers, ',' '\' and '_'

member.name: M:StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Convert the Cyrillic letters to Latin using Traditional Phonetic, replace all spaces with '_' and and remove all non-alphanumeric characters exept numbers, '_', '\', '-'

member.name: M:StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the first characters form a string
member.param: 32-signed integer that shows the number of first characters to be selected

member.name: M:StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Get file extension of a file name
member.param: String that represents a file name
member.returns: String with file extension from file name. If file name is invalid returns empty string

member.name: M:StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Get the type of a file extension
member.returns: The content type of file extension. If file extension not fount returns "application/octet-stream"

member.name: M:StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Get decimal number of a each character in the ASCII table
member.returns: Returns string converted to byte array
